UHm 

I like webcurator for few reasons 
1 .- Other organizations can share=
 my project and add urls to crawl 
This means difference investigator can w=
ork in the seam project with user name and password and personal GUI

2.- I=
 work with crawl in the only domain name. Web curator make teh configuratio=
n very easy

3.- Webcurator is a GUI for user have they own personal crawl
=

4.- Webcurator use heretrix us a motor you can make any special configurat=
ion you like
